positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Technology Analyst
experience.description: •	Developed a performance testing framework for Rest API’s using locust (Python) to enhance the efficiency and scalability of load testing•	Designed locust framework to check tolerance/behavior of the system under a specific expected load for minute changes in application•	Implemented the application framework for 10+ clients under different load conditions and reduced the testing process time by 95%•	Deployed the framework as a docker container on ECS which made the load testing process operative for software engineering team•	Received Pre-Placement Offer from CITI (CSC) Pune for the remarkable performance in the summer technology analyst program 2022
experience.description_html: • Developed a performance testing framework for Rest API’s using locust (Python) to enhance the efficiency and scalability of load testing• Designed locust framework to check tolerance/behavior of the system under a specific expected load for minute changes in application• Implemented the application framework for 10+ clients under different load conditions and reduced the testing process time by 95%• Deployed the framework as a docker container on ECS which made the load testing process operative for software engineering team• Received Pre-Placement Offer from CITI (CSC) Pune for the remarkable performance in the summer technology analyst program 2022
